QuestData.Title: Save Krennan Aranas
QuestData.Description: All these years after the war and Crowley was still hiding enough firepower in that cellar to level half of the district.$B$BIt might have to come to that, unfortunately.$B$BWe can't open fire just yet, there is a civilian trapped on the other side of the prison.$B$BNot just any civilian, either. Krennan Aranas is one of the most brilliant alchemists this world has known.$B$BOne of his potions saved my daughter, Tess, from dying soon after being born.$B$BTake my horse and rescue him. Krennan must live.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. We'll make sure Krennan makes it out of the city alive.
